1.2.1.commit_description: Fix for running Parboil when python2 is on the system but not 'python' or 'python' points to python 3

1.1.3.commit_description: Use python2 explicitly when present on system otherwise fallback to python.

1.1.1.commit_description: Fix stencil typo; remove TPACF since it takes ages to run.

1.0.1.commit_description: Change perl dependency to python external dependency.

1.0.0.commit_description: Initial commit of the Parboil OpenMP/OpenCL/CUDA benchmarks from the University of Illionis.
